sentences.en: A cavity likes a body hating a wisp cool breeze soul.
sentences.cn: 一腔爱一身恨一缕清风一丝魂.

sentences.en: A thin wisp of smoke straggled up through the trees.
sentences.cn: 一缕轻烟在林间袅袅升起。

sentences.en: A wisp of hair had escaped from under her hat.
sentences.cn: 一绺头发从她的帽下露出来.

sentences.en: A wisp of hair straggled across her ear.
sentences.cn: 一束头发散落在她耳朵上.

sentences.en: A wisp of smoke is curling up from a chimney.
Any wisp of cloud could cover a crescent moon. My future was dark.
sentences.cn: 一点云便能把月牙遮住, 我的将来是黑暗.

sentences.en: Explore a tranquility, look for one wisp of sunlight!
sentences.cn: 寻求一份安宁, 找寻一缕阳光!

sentences.en: It burns as a will - o'- the - wisp , dancing onward to fairylands of delight.
sentences.cn: 它会像磷火那样发出捉摸不定的光芒, 跳跃着飞向欢乐的仙境.

sentences.en: Not even a wisp of cloud will I bring away.
sentences.cn: 悄悄的我走了,正如我悄悄的来;我挥一挥衣袖,不带走一片云彩.

sentences.en: One little girl in particular moved like a wisp in the background.
sentences.cn: 尤其有个小女孩,在人身后像一阵清风似地走动.

sentences.en: She fussed with a wisp of hair over her ear.
sentences.cn: 她紧张不安地拨弄耳边的一缕头发。

sentences.en: She smoothed away a wisp of hair from her eyes.
sentences.cn: 她将眼睛上的一缕头发拨开。

sentences.en: The Wisp spell increases movement speed of the party.
sentences.cn: 小精灵法术增加移动速度的聚会.

sentences.en: Two Will O'the Wisp are summoned to help their summoner in battle.
sentences.cn: 在战斗中,两个鬼火将被召唤来帮助它们的召唤者.

sentences.en: You shouldn't hope to find perfect happiness it's just a will - o'the - wisp.
sentences.cn: 不要指望能找到十全十美的幸福 -- 那只不过是镜花水月.

words.tran_cn: 象小束状的，纤细的；脆弱的
